title: Glen Echo Park: Stories
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories               Stories       For over 120 years, Glen Echo Park has served as a place of leisure for its visitors. The stories that make up the park's rich history are indicative of the constant change of American society.   Chautauqua Era   Amusement Park Days   Becoming a National Park   A Summer of Change: The Civil Rights Story of Glen Echo Park   Saving the Carousel
